job_description:
Job Summary:

Adventure Travel Inc. is seeking a highly motivated and experienced Remote Travel Marketing Director to lead our marketing efforts and drive growth for our adventure travel company. As the Marketing Director, you will be responsible for developing and implementing marketing strategies to attract and retain customers, increasing brand awareness, and promoting our unique travel experiences. This is a full-time, remote position and is open to individual contributors who are passionate about the travel industry and have a proven track record in marketing and business development.

Compensation & Benefits:

This is a full-time/part-time with competitive compensation and benefits package. Benefits include health insurance, paid time off, and opportunities for professional development and growth within the company.

Responsibilities:

- Develop and implement marketing strategies to drive sales and increase brand awareness
- Conduct market research to identify target audiences and develop targeted campaigns
- Manage and maintain the company's social media presence across various channels
- Collaborate with sales team to develop marketing materials and campaigns to support sales efforts
- Oversee all digital marketing efforts, including email campaigns, paid advertising, and content creation
- Monitor and analyze marketing performance metrics and adjust strategies as needed
- Stay current on industry trends and competitors to ensure our marketing strategies remain innovative and effective
- Manage relationships with external agencies and vendors to execute marketing campaigns
- Develop and manage the marketing budget and report on ROI

Requirements:

- Bachelor's degree in marketing or related field
- Minimum of 5 years experience in marketing, preferably in the travel industry
- Proven track record in developing and implementing successful marketing strategies
- Strong understanding of digital marketing, including social media, email marketing, and paid advertising
- Excellent communication and writing skills
- Self-motivated and able to work independently
- Strong analytical skills and ability to interpret data to drive marketing decisions
- Knowledge of SEO and web analytics tools
- Proficient in Microsoft Office and Adobe Creative Suite
- Passion for adventure travel and knowledge of the industry is a plus
